comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Sulzer William Sulzer (1863-1941), briefly governor of New York, was impeached within months of taking office in 1913.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: A previous Bain/LOC photo shows Sulzer beginning his climb up the New York State Capitol's mountain of steps: www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3931852406/
